C<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>CuN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>S (251.8): Calcd C, 47.66; H, 3.18; N, 11.12 (%). Found C, 47.58; H, 3.24; N, 11.04 (%).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis

The title compound was hydrothermally synthesized from the reaction mixture of CuSO4⋅5H2O (0.5 mmol), 4,4'-bipy (0.5 mmol), 2,5-pyridinedicarboxylic acid (0.5 mmol), NaOH (1 mmol) and H2O (8 ml) at 190 °C for 3 days, followed by slowly cooling (5 °C/h) to room temperature. Dark red block crystals of 1 were recovered in 30% yield based on 4,4'-bipy. C10H8CuN2S (251.8): Calcd C, 47.66; H, 3.18; N, 11.12 (%). Found C, 47.58; H, 3.24; N, 11.04 (%).
